thumb.title: [TAS] PSX SIMPLE1500シリーズ ハローキティ Vol.01 ハローキティ ボウリング "Quest" by inconsistent in 05:34.15
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=07NOSOAQHCg以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6600M TAS originally published on 2025-06-14Simple 1500 Series: Hello Kitty Vol. 01 — Bowling is a bowling game that is part of the Simple 1500 Series, a collection of low budget Japanese video games that are sold at a lower price point than most other games. This game is the first of short subseries of games involving the Hello Kitty franchise. It has two modes: "Simple", which is a regular game of bowling, and "Quest", a series of levels with challenges such as having to strike certain pin layouts.This time, inconsistent ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/inconsistent) takes on the game's Quest mode and bowls down the various pin layouts in record time.
thumb.last_res_body: 覇王 最近流行りのロー... キャラの投球モー... 確かブロック崩し... えっ、このゲーム... HelloKittyって書...
